reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute, well-made, and comfortable, with soft material and perfect color accuracy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute for Fall, will work into the Winter!
items.body: I ordered this to layer over my sleeveless button up shirts and it is so CUTE! Let's me extend that wardrobe into fall. The sweater is actually decently heavyweight so it will work thru the winter. Fits true to size, it's not super tight but not so baggy that it looks sloppy over the layer underneath. Material feels soft, no weird smells...haven't washed it yet, but plan to with a gentle detergent on the handwash cycle in the washer and a lay flat to dry (just to make sure it doesn't shrink, pill, or stretch out). Overall, I am very happy with my purchase. Read more
items.author: LJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality and Very Slimming!
items.body: This sweater feels like really good quality. The sleeves are a bit long but they are tighter at the wrists so I don’t mind it at all. It’s more form fitting at the mid section which I find very slimming and helps accentuate my curves. The lower back is a nice sexy touch as well. It can be worn as is, or with an undershirt for modesty. I plan on purchasing this sweater in additional colors! I bought a medium and was satisfied with the sizing. Read more
items.author: Bre Cahill

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very versatile and super comfy!
items.body: Very comfy and stylish! I can dress this up or dress this down. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Kristin Thomas

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super cute sweater but definitely not "off the shoulder"
items.body: Super cute sweater, not itchy at all, nice quality, good weight, but the "off the shoulder" bit is kind of unrealistic unless you plan to sit like a statue. Once you give up and stop make it try to be something it's not it does wear super cute as a boatneck style. Read more
items.author: Dawn Patnode

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft, good quality!
items.body: So soft and comfy, good quality and good fit! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute, great for Autumn layered looks!
items.body: If you know how to style off the shoulder looks, or cropped long-sleeved tops, you love this. I got this knitted cropped sweater in brown and it has become one of my favorite autumn pieces. Goes very well with high waisted skirts and pants and is great for layering looks. I did not find any issues with the neck line as mentioned in some reviews. This is actually a very well-made garment and I will probably purchase it in other colors. I love it! Read more
items.author: R3tard

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not wearable
items.body: This is adorable on and fits well, except it came with a massive hole where the seems were not properly sewn together Read more
items.author: Scott

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars cute and comfortable
items.body: as describe. i love the feel, the color, the style and size of it. worn it a few times and it has not shrunk after a few washes. Read more
items.author: christine

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A-light Blue, Y-dark Gray, A-dark Red, A-beige, Z-green, B-khaki, Y-navy Blue, Z-gray Blue, Z-embroidered Red, Eb-black, A-white, A-caramel, A-dark Green, Z-dark Gray. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
